publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1945 Donald Gorrie: Regulation of Security Firms—That the Parliament urges the Executive to bring forward legislation, as has been done for England and Wales, to regulate security firms more tightly.

S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bruce Crawford*, Shiona Baird*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Patrick Harvie*, Robert Brown*, Nora Radcliffe*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*

S2M-1945 Donald Gorrie: Regulation of Security Firms—That the Parliament urges the Executive to bring forward legislation, as has been done for England and Wales, to regulate security firms more tightly. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bruce Crawford, Shiona Baird, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Bruce McFee, Patrick Harvie, Robert Brown, Nora Radcliffe, Alex Neil, Eleanor Scott, Mike Pringle*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1945 Regulation of Security Firms (lodged on 3 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*
